description:
From our law office in Rutherfordton, North Carolina, the attorneys at Grimes Teich Anderson provide exceptional advocacy and support to clients throughout Rutherfordton County and the surrounding areas who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims arising from motor vehicle accidents, defective products, dangerous property conditions, dog bites, nursing home abuse and other preventable tragedies
  • Workers' compensation
  • Social Security Disability
  • Employment law
  • Veterans benefits

With a history that dates back 40 years, our law firm has become one of our region's leading legal practices for the injured and disabled as well as employees who experienced a serious violation of their rights as workers. During our time in practice, we have grown to include eight total law offices across the Carolinas.

Our dedicated team of attorneys possess decades of combined legal experience, and we have two board-certified workers' compensation specialists on our staff, so you can trust you will receive the highest level of counsel regarding your matter to help increase your chances for success.

In recognition for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned consistent designation from Best Lawyers as well as AV Preeminent peer-review ratings* through Martindale-Hubbell and Top 100 Trial Lawyer rankings from the National Trial Lawyers. In addition, we have received Superb client ratings on Avvo along with many testimonials from our satisfied clients. Furthermore, we have earned a membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum as the result of the millions of dollars in total compensation we have recovered for our plaintiff clients.

If you would like to discuss your claim at no cost, you can contact Grimes Teich Anderson to schedule a free initial consultation.
